title: AnAnomalousWriter's 3D Wallpapers
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=AnAnomalousWriter
|no-right-margin=*]]
Hello, check out my other wiki page/s here:
http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/ananomalouswriter-s-wallpaper-place-and-more (No author page yet)
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[=]]
[[size xx-large]]Hello Hooman, 

Welcome to the World of 3D [[/size]]
[[/=]]
----
[[=image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/ananomalouswriter/welcome.png width="200px" caption="yes"]]
[[=]]
Feel free to use any of the works below :D
(Hover/Tap on the images to enlarge)
[[/=]]
